alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 11:57PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Madison, north central Crawford and southeastern Washington Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1156 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Wesley to near Strickler. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Huntsville... Elkins... West Fork... Winslow... Wesley... Kingston... Blackburn... Aurora... Devils Den State Park... Brentwood... Japton... Strickler... Witter... Georgetown... Woolsey... Crosses... Mount Gayler... Wyola... Tuttle... Sulphur City... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 41 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
